reviews.review_msg: I have an A or an A- in all my other SFU upper-level English courses. I am set for a B in Alys's ENGL 470W class. She takes marks off for the most nitpicky of things in amounts that do not make sense. Many of the activities we did in groups in her class had nothing to do with the course overall and seemed like make-work just for the heck of it.
